document_data.name: ''Manticore's Tail''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Manticore's Tail''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[spear]] that belonged to [[Raika]] a [[Reghedmen]] [[barbarian]] adventurer active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Manticore's Tail'' was a large [[polearm]] wielded with two hands. Its severe-looking metallic speartip was shaped like two triangles perched one atop the other.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Manticore's Tail raika.jpg|thumb|''Raika, wielding the Manticore's Tail.'']]
The magic spear was enchanted to sap life energy out of its targets and transferring its lion's share back to the wielder.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Raika]]: a [[half-orc]] [[barbarian]] who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
